thisfile: This file can be used to install your own modsor distribute your mods in a zip to other users
remarks:
description - Description in the "My Mods" pull down menu android - The android version; currently 5.1.1, 6.0.1 or universal (apk works on any version). rombuilddate - The date the ROM was built. NOT the release date. This can be found in the unzipped 5009_60.zip under /system/build.prop. For example: The 6.0.1 07 July ROM mentions: "ro.build.date=2017-06-29 11:43:58 Thursday". This means rombuilddate is 20170629. rombuilddate can also be universal (works on any sub version of the mentioned android version). file - The apk that needs to be installed odex - the odex that needs to be installed. Leave empty in case only a modded apk needs to be installed. orgpath - the folder on the sdcard from where the apk (and/or odex) should be installed, like "/sdcard/myFantasticMod/". Should end with a "/" and pay attention to uppercase/lowercase!! installpath - Folder location where the apk needs to be pushed to (in case of odex this will be arranged automatically)
Examples below! Android Settings install with odex, Joying Settings install (doesn't have an odex) Radio mod install, Reinstall original joying radio
